Page.name: Tunic_Ninja
Page.text: When worn, will give you the Ninja Perk.
You have 80% chance to NOT become visible
(if you are invisible) when using ranged
2 Black Tunics, 1 Enriched Magic Essence, 1 Binding Stone,
Knowledge needed: Tunic of the Ninja Making
If you already have the perk, you can't wear the tunic.
